duties_responsibilities.duty: Development and execution of sales account plans with customers locally focused on new business-to-business account development with residual income.
Prospecting, cold calling, and setting appointments with prospects, presenting programs to meet a sales quota.
Promoting and selling products and services in established sales territory focused on all segments.
Emphasizing product features based on analysis of customer’s needs and on technical knowledge of product capabilities.
Assisting customers with cost savings initiatives and demonstrating a sense of urgency when addressing customer inquiries.

Planning sales and gross profit goals for each key account by developing yearly objectives through maintaining accurate, detailed, and comprehensive knowledge of the potential of each account in designated territory.
Developing high potential prospects to guarantee future sales growth through quality sales calls.
Demonstrating consultative solutions selling to meet the customer’s needs.
